p: I Andrew H Derrick being first duly sworn say that he I am the Plff in the above application for a writ of Habeas Corpus that I know the contents of said app lication and the same is true of my own knowledge except matters therein state on inf ormation and belief and as to those matters I believe them to be true
Subscribed and sworn to before me this the 31 day of December 1866
